Package view

Class FacultyView

java.lang.Object
view.UserView
view.FacultyView
Direct Known Subclasses:
FYPCoordinatorView
public class FacultyView extends UserView
Displays the menu for Faculty members using the information provided by the controller classes FacultyController, ProjectController, and RequestController.
Since:
2023-04-15
Version:
1.0

    Fields

    Field

    static final String
    ANSI_RED
    Sets text colour to red for (*NEW*) notifications.
    static final String
    ANSI_RESET
    Resets text colour to default.

  • Constructor Details

    • FacultyView

      public FacultyView(String supervisorID)
      Creates a new FacultyView.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - The user ID of the faculty logging into the domain.

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Displays the menu and notifications for this Faculty.
      Specified by:
      displayMenu in class UserView

    • displayApp

      public void displayApp()
      Application to display the menu, read user input and call the selected task.
      Specified by:
      displayApp in class UserView

    • manageProjectView

      public void manageProjectView()
      Displays a project menu when the Faculty wants to create, update, or view their projects. It then reads user input and calls the selected task.

    • createProjectView

      public void createProjectView()
      Displays the instructions for the Faculty to create a new project. It will repeatedly ask for a new project title if the one entered already exists.

    • updateProjectView

      public void updateProjectView()
      Displays the instructions for the Faculty to change the title of their project. It will repeatedly ask for a new title if the one entered already exists.

    • displayStudentRequest

      public void displayStudentRequest()
      Displays the requests made by all Students to this Faculty. It then calls the display menu to approve a request.

    • ApproveProjectMenu

      public void ApproveProjectMenu()
      Displays the menu for the Faculty to approve Student requests. It then reads user input and executes the selected task.

    • displayRequestHistory

      public void displayRequestHistory()
      Displays the request history of this Faculty.

    • transferStudentView

      public void transferStudentView()
      Displays the instructions for the Faculty to transfer their project.
